message: Fair split, let's start with a good foundation!
A good start, but I want a bit more for myself!
You wanted more, so I'll give you a slightly better deal. Let's see if you'll accept this one!
I'm still not satisfied, Alice. I think I can get a better deal than this.
I think we're getting close, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and see if we can finally agree on a deal!
